description:
Seth has set out on a new adventure to unravel the mysteries of Radiant. His destination is Caislean Merlin, the city of the Knights-sorcerers. He boards Alma`s airship and, along with Alma and her new helpers, Bossman and Jiji, heads for the continent of Cyfandir. Meanwhile, Dragunov, the Inquisition captain, visits the Inquisition`s holy land at General Torque`s order. He`s prepared to face capital punishment, but...
Source: crunchyroll
